## radix variable

Returns a [Stringer](./strings.stringer.md) which formats given numbers to `radix`<!-- -->, `len` and with optional prefix (not included in `len`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
radix: (radix: number, len: number, prefix?: string) => Stringer<number>
```
